Estimated Gestational Age at Delivery.data-element: The purpose of this value set is to describe concepts of assessment for estimated gestational age at delivery.
Estimated Gestational Age at Delivery.incld: This value set may use a model element related toÂ assessment.
Estimated Gestational Age at Delivery.excld: Includes concepts that define an assessment of the estimated gestational age at delivery.

LOINC: Gestational age Estimated from last menstrual period

Emergency Department Evaluation.data-element: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of an assessment performed in the emergency department.
Emergency Department Evaluation.incld: This value set may use a model element related to Assessment.
Emergency Department Evaluation.excld: Includes concepts that represent an assessment that was performed in the emergency department.

LOINC: Emergency medicine Emergency department Admission evaluation note
Emergency department History and physical note
Emergency department Admission history and physical note
Emergency department Plan of care note
Emergency medicine Emergency department Plan of care note
Emergency department+Hospital Summary of episode note

Tobacco Use Screening.data-element: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for assessments to screen for tobacco use.
Tobacco Use Screening.incld: This value set may use a model element related to Assessment.
Tobacco Use Screening.excld: Includes concepts that represent an assessment for tobacco use, including smoking and smoke-less tobacco products.

LOINC: Have you used tobacco in the last 30 days [SAMHSA]
Have you used smokeless tobacco product in the last 30 days [SAMHSA]

Falls Screening.data-element: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for assessments using a falls screening tool.
Falls Screening.incld: This value set may use a model element related to Assessment.
Falls Screening.excld: Includes concepts that represent an assessment for fall risk.

LOINC: History of falling; immediate or within 3 months [Morse Fall Scale]
Standardized fall risk assessment was conducted [CMS Assessment]

Standardized Tools for Assessment of Cog.vs-id: Standardized Tools for Assessment of Cognition
Standardized Tools for Assessment of Cog.data-element: The purpose of this value set is to define concepts for assessments representing total score results for standardized tools used for the evaluation of cognition.
Standardized Tools for Assessment of Cog.incld: This value set may use a model element related to Assessment.
Standardized Tools for Assessment of Cog.excld:
Includes concepts that describe assessments with total score results for the following standardized tools:
-Blessed Orientation-Memory-Concentration Test (BOMC)
-Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MoCA)
-St. Louis University Mental Status Examination (SLUMS)
-Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) [Note: The MMSE has not been well validated for non-Alzheimer's dementias]
-Short Informant Questionnaire on Cognitive Decline in the Elderly (IQCODE)
-Ascertain Dementia 8 (AD8) Questionnaire
-Minimum Data Set (MDS) Brief Interview of Mental Status (BIMS) [Note: Validated for use with nursing home patients only]
-Formal neuropsychological evaluation
-Mini-Cog.

LOINC: Prior assessment Brief Interview for Mental Status (BIMS) summary score [MDSv3]

Standardized Pain Assessment Tool.data-element: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for assessments using pain-focused tools or instruments to quantify pain intensity.
Standardized Pain Assessment Tool.incld: This value set may use a model element related to Assessment.
Standardized Pain Assessment Tool.excld: Includes concepts that represent an assessment of pain intensity.

LOINC: Pain severity - 0-10 verbal numeric rating [Score] - Reported
Pain severity Wong-Baker FACES pain rating scale

PHQ 9 and PHQ 9M Tools.data-element: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for the assessments of PHQ 9 and PHQ 9M resulting in a completed depression assessment scores for adults and adolescents.
PHQ 9 and PHQ 9M Tools.incld: This value set may use a model element related to Assessment.
PHQ 9 and PHQ 9M Tools.excld: Includes concepts that represent a completed assessment using PHQ 9 and PHQ 9M depression assessment tools for adults and adolescents with a summary score.

LOINC: Patient Health Questionnaire-9: Modified for Teens total score [Reported.PHQ.Teen]
Patient Health Questionnaire 9 item (PHQ-9) total score [Reported]

History of hip fracture in parent.vs-id: History of hip fracture in parent
History of hip fracture in parent.data-element: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for H145 assessments of a family history of hip fracture in a parent.
History of hip fracture in parent.incld: This value set may use a model element related to Assessment.
History of hip fracture in parent.excld: Includes concepts that represent an assessment for family history of hip fracture in a parent.

SNOMEDCT: Family history: maternal hip fracture before age 75 (situation)
Family history of paternal hip fracture (situation)
Family history of hip fracture in parent (situation)

Malnutrition Assessment.data-element: Malnutrition assessment of a patient based upon clinically relevant criteria.
Malnutrition Assessment.incld: These terms will be used for Malnutrition Quality Measures.
Malnutrition Assessment.excld: Clinical nutrition assessment terms included in extensional value sets.

Malnutrition Risk Screening.data-element: This set of values indicates that a malnutrition screening was done by the health care professional.
Malnutrition Risk Screening.incld: Data elements included in this set indicate an individual has been screened for malnutrition.
Malnutrition Risk Screening.excld: Malnutrition Risk Screening criteria from multiple terminologies are included.

ICD10CM: Encounter for screening for nutritional disorder
SNOMEDCT: Assessment using malnutrition universal screening tool (procedure)

Malnutrition Screening At Risk Result.data-element: This set of values indicates that a patient was found to be at risk for malnutrition after completing a malnutrition screening done by the health care professional.
Malnutrition Screening At Risk Result.incld: Data included in this set represent that an individual has been evaluated to be at risk for malnutrition.
Malnutrition Screening At Risk Result.excld: Malnutrition At Risk criteria from the SNOMED-CT terminology are included.

Birth Weight.data-element: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for assessments measuring birth weights of newborn.
Birth Weight.incld: This value set may use a model element related to Assessment.
Birth Weight.excld: Includes concepts that identify an assessment of the birth weight of a newborn.
